useCase.name: Request Access to Restricted Object
useCase.trigger: User searches and selects a restricted object

mainSequence.step: User searches and selects a restricted object
User requests access details from the Repository Interface
Repository Interface requests Access Control System to display contact option
Access Control System displays the contact option to the User
User fills in and sends the request email
Email Notification System forwards the User request to the Collection Curator
Collection Curator reviews the User request
Collection Curator updates access permissions in the Access Control System if approved
Access Control System notifies the User of the decision via email
Email Notification System displays the access decision notification to the User
